Class CoffeeTruck

java.lang.Object
Metthy.CoffeeTruck
public class CoffeeTruck extends Object

      The name of the coffee truck.

    • location

      private String location
      The current location of the coffee truck.

    • bins

      private ArrayList<StorageBin> bins
      List of storage bins.

    • salesLog

      private final ArrayList<String> salesLog
      Log of all sales made by this truck.

      Total sales revenue generated by the truck.

  • Constructor Details

    • CoffeeTruck

      public CoffeeTruck(String name, String location)
      Constructs a CoffeeTruck with the given name and location. Initializes 8 storage bins and an empty sales log.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the coffee truck
      location - the initial location of the truck

  • Method Details

    • displayBins

      public void displayBins()
      Displays the current contents of all storage bins in the truck. Empty bins are marked as [Empty].

    • displayInfo

      public void displayInfo()
      Displays the truck's name, location, storage bin contents, transaction history, and total sales.

    • assignItemToBin

      public void assignItemToBin(int binNumber, String itemType, double itemQuantity)
      Assigns a specific item type and quantity to a given bin number.
      Parameters:
      binNumber - the index of the bin (0-based)
      itemType - the type of item to store in the bin
      itemQuantity - the quantity of the item to assign

    • modifyBin

      public void modifyBin(int binNumber)
      Modifies the contents of a specified bin.
      Parameters:
      binNumber - the 1-based bin number (for display and user selection)

    • setDefaultLoadout

      public void setDefaultLoadout()
      Fills the first 6 bins of a truck with Small Cups, Medium Cups, Large Cups, Coffee Beans, Milk, and Water respectively. Remaining bins are left empty.

    • setLoadout

      public void setLoadout()
      Allows user to set up the loadout of a truck.

    • restockOneBin

      public void restockOneBin(int binNumber)
      Restocks a specific storage bin.
      Parameters:
      binNumber - the bin number to restock

    • restockAllBins

      public void restockAllBins()
      Restocks all bins that have an assigned item.

    • modifyAllBins

      public void modifyAllBins()
      Allows the user to modify all storage bins. User can choose to set bins to maximum capacity or manually adjust each bin.

    • emptyOneBin

      public void emptyOneBin(int binNumber)
      Empties a specific storage bin.
      Parameters:
      binNumber - the bin number to empty (1-based index)

    • emptyAllBins

      public void emptyAllBins()
      Empties all storage bins.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name of a truck.
      Returns:
      the name of the truck

    • getLocation

      public String getLocation()
      Returns the current location of a truck.
      Returns:
      the truck location

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets a truck's name.
      Parameters:
      name - the new name for the truck

    • setLocation

      public void setLocation(String location)
      Sets a truck's location.
      Parameters:
      location - the new location for the truck

    • getBins

      public ArrayList<StorageBin> getBins()
      Returns the list of storage bins associated with a truck.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of StorageBin objects

    • findBin

      public StorageBin findBin(String itemName)
      Finds and returns the first bin that matches the given item name.
      Parameters:
      itemName - the name of the item to search for
      Returns:
      the matching StorageBin, or null if not found

    • recordSale

      public void recordSale(String coffeeType, String size, double grams, double milk, double water, double price)
      Records a drink sale to a truck's sales log.
      Parameters:
      coffeeType - the type of coffee sold
      size - the size of the drink
      grams - the grams of coffee beans used
      milk - the ounces of milk used
      water - the ounces of water used
      price - the price of the drink

    • getSalesLog

      public ArrayList<String> getSalesLog()
      Returns the list of recorded drink sales for the truck.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of sales log entries

    • addToTotalSales

      public void addToTotalSales(double amount)
      Adds a specified amount to the truck's total sales.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to add to total sales

    • getTotalSales

      public double getTotalSales()
      Returns the total sales revenue for the truck.
      Returns:
      the total sales amount
